[1] 1 widuli bala uthpadanaya 1.1 jala widuli balaya 1.2 thapaja balaya 1.3 sulan balaya 1.4 surya balaya 1.5 bhuthapaja balaya 1.6 nyashtika balaya 2 widuli bala sampreshanaya 2.1 sampreshana jalaya 2.2 indu – shri lanka jalaka athuru sabandiya 3 widuli bala apayogithawaya 3.1 antha-paribhogika widuli bala gasthu 3.2 widuli balaya bhawitha kirime ayakirim walin nidahas kara athi aayathana 4 aashritha saha satahan 4.1 satahan 4.2 aashritha widuli bala uthpadanaya[sanskaranaya] warthamanayedi shri lankawe widuli bala uthpadanaya sandaha prathamika prabhawa thunak bhawitha wethi; thapa widuli bala (jaiwaskandhaya, galanguru, saha anekuth siyalu indhana-thel prabhawa walin ganena shakthiya adangu weyi), jala widuli balaya (kuda jala widuli), saha anekuth sampradayika-nowana punarjanya balashakthiya prabhawa (surya balashakthiya saha sulan balashakthiya) adangu weyi: prabhawaya anuwa upayojya jalaka dharithawa (wamehi), saha prabhawaya anuwa warshika uthpadanaya (dakunehi) rekhapathrayanhi dakwe.[1][2][3] jala widuli bala prabhawa atharathura wadath wishala rajayata-ayath wyapruthi menma, paudgalika kuda-jala widuli pahasukamda adangu wethi.
